title: 2000/106/EC: Council Decision of 31 January 2000 appointing a German member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 31 January 2000
appointing a German member of the Committee of the Regions
(2000/106/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1998(1) appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr GĂźnter Meyer, member, notified to the Council on 17 November 1999;
Having regard to the proposal from the German Government,
main_body: Mr Stanislaw Tillich is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr GĂźnter Meyer for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 January 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. PINA MOURA
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
